text:
springML Inc, http://www.springml.com / ONSITE (Sterling VA, Pleasanton, CA) / VISA sponsorship available

We are a well funded, fast growing analytics start up head quartered in the bay area.

We are looking for Data Analysts and Architects. Please apply at http://www.springml.com/careers/.

Technologies we use: Salesforce, Spark, SQL, R, Python, Docker, AWS
